title: Misty Omens
story: A thick, unnatural mist clings to the castle, blurring familiar shapes and muffling sounds. Whispers seem to drift on the cold air, hinting at forgotten paths and hidden secrets.
effect: During this Day phase, heroes may perform a Memory Search in any room. However, due to the pervasive mist, Memory Searches still only succeed on a D6 roll of 6. Furthermore, if a Memory Search attempt fails, the hero immediately loses 1 Sanity from the disorienting whispers and spectral visions.
